Bos Ducati: Fabio Quartararo Bakal Dirayu 6 Pabrikan
07 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Ducati Team, Davide Tardozzi, meyakini bahwa enam pabrikan peserta MotoGP akan memperebutkan Fabio Quartararo untuk musim 2021. Hal ini ia nyatakan kepada Speedweek, mengindikasikan adanya ketertarikan Ducati pada rider 20 tahun tersebut.
Meski tak terlalu gemilang di Moto3 dan Moto2, kehebatan Quartararo sudah jadi sorotan penghuni paddock MotoGP saat ia menjuarai FIM CEV Repsol Moto3 2013 dan 2014. Musim ini pun ia membela Petronas Yamaha SRT, dan langsung tampil menggebrak.
Atas alasan ini, tak heran jika ia diperebutkan saat kontraknya habis pada akhir 2020. "Fabio bukan fenomena kebetulan, ia pasti bisa berkendara dengan level yang sama selama 10 tahun ke depan. Setiap tim di MotoGP, yang paham benar soal bisnis ini, pasti sadar betul soal itu," ujar Tardozzi.

Ducati Boss: Fabio Quartararo Will be Seduced by 6 Manufacturers
Nov 7 2019, 11:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ducati Team manager, Davide Tardozzi, believes that the six MotoGP manufacturers will compete for Fabio Quartararo for the 2021 season. He stated this to Speedweek, indicating Ducati's interest in the 20-year rider.
Although not too bright in Moto3 and Moto2, the greatness of Quartararo has been in the spotlight of MotoGP paddock occupants when he won the 2013 and 2014 MotoGP FIM CEV Repsol. This season he also defended Petronas Yamaha SRT, and immediately appeared kicked off.
For this reason, it is not surprising that he is contested when his contract expires at the end of 2020. "Fabio is not a coincidence phenomenon, he can certainly drive with the same level for the next 10 years. Every team in MotoGP, who knows well about this business, must be aware true about that, "said Tardozzi.
